dataList.dlg: You called me? Ow, my tongue's burning... Right, how can I help?
As often as we get physical... we still have paperwork to take care of in the morning. There are meetings, too.
Alright~ Let's go eat something first. You aren't gonna follow along if it's beef noodles again? I mean, what other place around here serves meals that good?
Haah... Maybe I should wear sunglasses for night training. All the flickering flames are hard on my eyes.
This venue? Sure, I go often. I'm a regular.
This clothing's embroidery was made with moonlight stones. I heard higher sections get more of these fancyworks.

We look like we get along fine? Well... I see how you get that impression. We gather up and rub shoulders with each other pretty much all the time, after all.
Hmph, and yet they won't join me to dine nearly as often.
Liu Association offers opportunities to learn all kinds of martial arts and techniques, Bajiquan was my personal favorite.
Ah... You wanna know how we deal with sharp weapons? Heh, this jacket isn't easily penetrated by the likes of them. The fabric used by my coworkers in higher sections can stop even more, I think?
...I see. I'll get busier, won't I. Well, I'll be training myself to prepare for it.
Hmm... Should I look up... what to eat next?
I'm with you.
I'll take the front.
Keep your distance. You'll get yourself hurt.
I'll end this in a moment.
That's one...
Kgh...
Down the gutter!
Agh... I could... really use... a bowl of beef... noodles.
This is no trouble at all.
Tch... I've failed.
This... wasn't too bad, don't you think?
Whew~ That was a job well done. Wanna have some beef noodles on the way back?
I'll need... more experience and training, it seems...
